Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life and his creative years. The first one is devoted to childhood and young adulthood, depicting family tragedies, the struggle against hunger and the will for knowledge. The second one divides into different sequences. Some passages of his life are illustrated, while others
